message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
I think a 55-45 split is a fairer starting point. Let's see if we can come to an agreement.
Let's meet in the middle of our previous offers
Let's split it evenly. I'm willing to compromise, but I'm also mindful of the diminishing value of the money with each round.  A 50-50 split feels like the fairest solution at this point.
